name: Interplanetary (itch) (SominStudios)
description:
Fly around space and land on different planets and try to find your spaceship that mysteriously flew off without warning! Thankfully you got gps on the ship so you know where to go!

Controlls : 

While on ground : 

A & D = horizontal Movement

Space = Jump

Left Click = Use Jetpack

While in space

Left Click = Use Jetpack

W, A, S, D = Movement

Note that you have to use jetpack in order to move in space.

Tips and Notes : 

To get out of gravity of a planet you have to both jump and use the jetpack at the same time!

After level 5 the levels are autogenerated and might not always be balanced! So if you get a really hard level, go to the main menu and click play and you will get a new one!

The browser version of the game might now work for everyone so if you are having trouble, just download the game instead!
